GSD.product_version: versions from v3.13 to before v5.15.86
GSD.description:
power: supply: fix residue sysfs file in error handle route of __power_supply_register()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.86 by commit 870ad0917d837eff84de479a5e2596a9b43329ea, it was introduced in version v3.13 by commit 80c6463e2fa3377febfc98a6672d92d07f3c26c1. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: power: supply: fix residue sysfs file in error handle route of __power_supply_register()
